location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to John Walter Sherer, Civil Auditor, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing account disbursements and vouchers (not present) for the disbursements of the Bushire Residency from April to 10 July 1812. It informs the Bombay Government that this has been charged to the Bengal Government; authority over the Bushire Residency was transferred from Bengal to Bombay on 10 July 1812.
